name: Driving Prado Around City
description:
Driving Prado Around City is the 1 endless racing game that takes you to another level of smooth driving simulations and high graphic quality. Ever wanted to try a real car simulator? Now you can choose from a huge range of cars, from urban hatchbacks, to luxury business sedans and powerful sports cars designed for racing! You can either drive a manual transmission with clutch and stick shift or keep to the classic automatic gearbox. The huge open world map with dangerous turns city, and also unpredictable intersections is designed in a creative way to test your extreme car driving skills and provide the best gameplay experience.
Features:
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- 3D cockpit view
- ABC, ESP, TC simulation that you can turn on/off
- Realistic car damage and mechanics
- Unlimited play - No fuel or time limits
